item.title: Gold Futures Rise as U.S. Economic Data Points to Cooling Economy
item.description: Gold futures rose as the market digested the latest U.S. economic data and its consequences for interest-rate cuts.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Mixed as Investors Raise Bets on December Rate Cut

item.title: Dollar Recovers on U.S. Labor Data

item.title: How Parents Can Help Their Boomerang Child---Without Derailing Their Own Retirement
item.description: Set boundaries and encourage responsibility for your kids, and consider making catch-up contributions in your 401(k)s and IRAs.
